project.name: Project name goes here (e.g., TRELLIS)
project.title: Longer project title goes here (e.g., "Capturing Semantic ..."

status.short: A short description of the project (1 or 2 sentences goes here)
status.long: A longer description (several paragraphs or bullets) of the status goes here. Any html tag can be used, you can put bullet lists and have pointers to any other pages. NOTE THAT IT HAS TO BE WELL FORMED HTML.

description.short: A short description of the project (1 or 2 sentences goes here)
description.long: A longer description (several paragraphs or bullets) of the project goes here.

research.short: A list of research keywords goes here (e.g., ontologies, PSMs,...)
research.long: A longer description (several paragraphs or bullets) of the project goes here.

link.b: You can organize them in categories

link.a: You can add as many links as you want

project.demo:
Demo would go here. It can be a screen walkthrough demonstration.
You can always just say:
